dcterms:creator: Richard S Sutton
Andrew G Barto
dcterms:description: A one-dimensional MDP environment widely used in reinforcement learning, where the agent has two actions: left and right, and takes each action with equal probability.
dcterms:title: 19-state random walk environment

dcterms:creator: Richard S Sutton
Andrew G Barto
dcterms:description: A classic episodic task in reinforcement learning where the goal is to drive a car up a hill, which is a continuous state space problem.
dcterms:title: Mountain car
